IMPLEMENTED - Disables the specified CygNet Device
IMPLEMENTED - Creates a new CygNet Device with the specified id from the supplied CygNet Import file XML content.  The specified deviceId must be present in the import XML content

put.summary: IMPLEMENTED - Replaces the specified CygNet Device with the contents of supplied CygNet Import file XML content.  The specified deviceId must be present in the import XML content

get.summary: IMPLEMENTED - Set CygNet Domain™

post.summary: IMPLEMENTED - Set Gateway Information (group/node)

IMPLEMENTED - Creates an example JWT that can be used for diagnostics against the API.  Note that this is not an authenication API, but rather just a way to see the required contents of an EdgeAPI JWT
post.description: Use any value for username to get a readonly token.  Append 'Read', 'Write', 'Operate', 'Admin', 'Service' to the name to get a token with that level of access

get.summary: IMPLEMENTED - Get JWT AuthCheck state.  Test Only.

post.summary: IMPLEMENTED - Set JWT Authorization checking state.  Test Only.
